reviewText: No did not play on my DVD player!!!!!!!!
Can't even watch it because its a different region than my TVs :( disappointed!

The movie is great, one of my favorite Stephen King movies done really well and keeping true to the book. Unfortunately it was a region 2 and I had no idea it wouldn't play in u.s. players. So it's a return.....
Will not play in neither one of my DVD players.
I always enjoyed this movie.  No problems with anything
